an7.73:4.1: * “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sunetto nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
an7.73:4.2: Sunettassa kho pana, bhikkhave, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṃ.
an7.73:4.3: Sunetto satthā sāvakānaṃ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desesi.
an7.73:4.4: Ye kho pana, bhikkhave, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni nappasādesuṃ te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
an7.73:4.5: Ye kho pana, bhikkhave, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṃ te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
an7.73:5.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, mūgapakkho nāma satthā ahosi … pe …
an7.73:5.3: kuddālako nāma satthā ahosi … pe …
an7.73:5.6: arako nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
an7.73:5.7: Arakassa kho pana, bhikkhave, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṃ.
an7.73:5.8: Arako nāma satthā sāvakānaṃ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desesi.
an7.73:5.9: Ye kho pana, bhikkhave, arakassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni nappasādesuṃ, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
an7.73:5.10: Ye kho pana, bhikkhave, arakassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṃ, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
an7.73:6.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, yo ime satta satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge anekasataparivāre sasāvakasaṅghe paduṭṭhacitto akkoseyya paribhāseyya, bahuṃ so apuññaṃ pasaveyyā”ti?
an7.73:6.3: “Yo, bhikkhave, ime satta satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge anekasataparivāre sasāvakasaṅghe paduṭṭhacitto akkoseyya paribhāseyya, bahuṃ so apuññaṃ pasaveyya.
an7.73:6.4: Yo ekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacitto akkosati paribhāsati, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ apuññaṃ pasavati.
an7.73:6.6: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ito bahiddhā evarūpiṃ khantiṃ vadāmi yathāmaṃ sabrahmacārīsu.
an7.73:7.2: ‘na no sabrahmacārīsu cittāni paduṭṭhāni bhavissantī’ti.
